title: Big Data Not A Cure-All In Medicine
teaser: Big data is a trendy term for the ever-expanding cloud of information that's online and increasingly searchable. Some researchers say it could change the way medical research is done and the way individual doctors make medical decisions. Others say big data raises too many big questions â€” especially when it comes to medicine.
